command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user XTqR3P9v8tSgKnm.root --database jHCPjtWAoWrQh3F8kPBEFC --execute 
-- 设置授权日期为2026-01-06（这样2025-12-31和2026-01-05的记录应该被过滤掉）
UPDATE stockUserPermissions 
SET authorizationDate = '2026-01-06 00:00:00' 
WHERE stockUserId = 1;

-- 验证更新结果
SELECT id, userId, stockUserId, authorizationDate FROM stockUserPermissions WHERE stockUserId = 1;
